counter.service
Class ServiceComponent

java.lang.Object
  counter.service.ServiceComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
CounterInterface, CounterResyncInterface, org.objectweb.fractal.api.control.BindingController, org.objectweb.fractal.api.control.LifeCycleController
public class ServiceComponent
extends java.lang.Object
implements CounterInterface, org.objectweb.fractal.api.control.BindingController, CounterResyncInterface, org.objectweb.fractal.api.control.LifeCycleController

The ServiceComponent is the class that describes the main functionality of the system. This is that they are the components that keep the state of the system (a counter here), the inform the managerial components for state changes and they receive corrections by the managerial elements.

public void inreaseCounter(int roundId)
Description copied from interface: CounterInterface
The increased counter method. Each time called the counter increase its value by 1.
